headline: A Look at Lennar’s Valuation as Longtime Co-CEO Jon Jaffe Plans 2025 Retirement
summary: Lennar (LEN) is preparing for a leadership change, with Co-Chief Executive Officer and President Jon Jaffe set to retire at the end of 2025 after 42 years. Executive Chairman Stuart Miller will continue as CEO, and no successor has been named for Jaffe's position. See our latest analysis for Lennar. The leadership change comes as Lennar’s share price has experienced notable volatility. After a robust 7.8% share price gain over the past week, the stock remains down 8.5% year-to-date. Over the...
